name: vConstruct
overview:
vConstruct aims to make switching business applications as simple as changing socks. They make moving to the cloud easier. They achieve this by providing both business tools and services that are painless, repeatable and secure. Their new flagship product, MigrationPath, shortens the time to move from one system to another. Itâ€™s perfect for companies looking to upgrade to Salesforce.com or jump onto NetSuite. And because itâ€™s web-based, it can be used wherever and whenever by everyone. They are a small company of 8, meaning they don’t treat their clients as just another number. They are able to give them the attention they deserve.

To date, they’ve assisted companies ranging from tech to non-profit, helping them implement and use a variety of cloud-based solutions. Their mission is to create happy technology users. Better technology leads to happier technology users. As a team, their goal is not simply to build a great company, but also propel a movement thatâ€™s transforming the way business gets done.
